Package metro.algorithm.map

Class TunnelsMapMonitor

java.lang.Object
metro.algorithm.map.TunnelsMapMonitor
public class TunnelsMapMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to access the map of the tunnels. It uses (x, y) coordinates specified in Coordinates class instances. It allows thread-safe moving of the trains and reading the state of the map.

  • Constructor Details

    • TunnelsMapMonitor

      public TunnelsMapMonitor​(Coordinates[][] trains, Coordinates[][] trainRoutes)
      Constructor of TunnelsMapMonitor class.
      Parameters:
      trains - an array of trains. Each train is defined by an array of Coordinates values of its wagons.

  • Method Details

    • moveToNextCrossing

      public void moveToNextCrossing​(Coordinates start, Coordinates end, Coordinates[] wagons, FieldTypes trainType, boolean moveForward) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Procedure moving the train from crossing start to crossing end
      Parameters:
      start - coordinates of current crossing
      end - coordinates of destination crossing
      wagons - array of Coordinates defining the individual wagons of the train.
      trainType - one of the T1, T2, T3 values of enum FieldTypes
      moveForward - boolean value specifying the direction the train is heading
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - this method uses sleep to visualize the transition in GUI

    • printMap

      public void printMap()
      Prints the tunnel's map.

    • beginPainting

      public void beginPainting()
      Acquires the synchronization tools. After reading you should invoke endPainting().

    • endPainting

      public void endPainting()
      Releases the synchronization tools. Should be invoked after beginPainting(), once the reading is done.

    • getField

      public FieldTypes getField​(Coordinates field)
      Function used to get the value of a given field
      Parameters:
      field - coordinates of a given field
      Returns:
      the FieldTypes value of the field

      public java.util.List<Coordinates> getStationsEntrances()
      Returns list of coordinates of entrances to all stations
      Returns:
      list of coordinates defining the entrances to the stations
